cause.description:
Robert Plunkett was one of many people who have died while on the line of duty. He is a father of great friend of mine and he will always be remembered for helping out those who are in need. May he Rest In Peace. Thoughts and Prayers are with the Plunkett Family ♥
1. Canada is loosing to many people while they are on the line of duty.
cause.mission: help the family's of those who have passed in line of duty.
cause.name: Robert Plunkett
